doc.title: Tokyo Suckerpunch
doc.plot: Billy Chaka - popular graphic novelist, Cleveland native and rabid Japanophile - travels to Japan for the first time to attend the premiere of a cheesy movie made from his self-mythologizing work (in the feature Chaka is a journalist for teen magazine Youth in Asia). There, he must contend with not only jarring culture shock but also mysterious fans and a dangerous, mob-related kidnapping that starts to resemble one of his own crazy plots. All, of course, while love-hate sparring with his cute and resourceful editor, Sarah.
